```{r}
library(knitr)
library(rmarkdown)
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(ggthemes)
library(hrbrthemes)

theme_set(theme_ipsum()+
          theme(strip.background =element_rect(fill="lightgray"),
                axis.title.x  = element_text(angle = 0,
                                            size = rel(1.5),
                                            margin = margin(10,0,0,0)),
                axis.title.y  = element_text(angle = 0,
                                            size = rel(1.5),
                                            margin = margin(0,10,0,0))
                )
          )
```
